Hentai logic be hentai logic, so many thing could have been done by the wife and husband. Wife could have bite on rapist dick when suking. I don't know japanese law but you can still get a divorce with your wife if you have evidence. Also you can sue the one who ruined your wife too. Cheating is still cheating, but by the fact that the wife have multiple dick inside her compare to the husband having his dick inside someone else. The wife is a worse cheater than the husband. Pretty sure with that fact the court would favor the husband more and the divorce would go through. Another thing is blatant cheating is worse than covert cheating. The racist did so many thing wrong that he could have gotten a life sentence in other country. Japan is a failure of a country in preventing rape. Probably because it is a misogynist country with a age limit of 13 and older to have sex. These hentai just show how garbage the Japanese culture in term of respecting woman and not seeing them as object.
Not that I would want it to happen, but a scenario like this would normally lead to something *bad* happening.
Yeah the bitch deserves to get cucked after all ./.
Poor girl. Fucking husband deserved it.
